sprunki-remastered.title: Sprunki Remastered
sprunki-remastered.slogan: Back to the Roots, But Make it LEGENDARY!
sprunki-remastered.description: Sprunki Remastered: The OG experience rebuilt from the ground up with ultra-HD polish.

HomeIframe.title: Sprunki Remastered
HomeIframe.description: Experience Sprunki Remastered, the legendary remake taking it to the next level.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunki Remastered is a blend of nostalgic elements with modern updates for a fresh yet familiar experience.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Step into the world of Sprunki with zero-latency interactions.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Explore retro-enhanced visuals and 32-bit crystal-clear audio.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Engage with a community of veterans and newcomers.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Enjoy a classic engine with modern power enhancements.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Experience retro visuals now in 8K definition.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Maximize your gameplay with zero-latency responses.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Join a vibrant community mixing old school and new cool.
